description: Some 118 towns and villages were struck in 24 hours, the most this year, Kyiv's interior minister says.
maintext: "I see there is a lot of fatigue, if I have to say the truth, from all the sides," she is heard to tell the pair, Vovan and Lexus. "We're near the moment in which everybody understands that we need a way out."
title: Ukraine war: Russia hits most settlements in one day, says Kyiv
